thread.title: BRIEF-Appaloosa LP Dissolves Share Stake In Chesapeake Energy, Cuts In Southwest Airlines

title: BRIEF-Appaloosa LP Dissolves Share Stake In Chesapeake Energy, Cuts In Southwest Airlines
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Appaloosa LP:
* APPALOOSA LP DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORP - SEC FILING‍​
* APPALOOSA LP UPS SHARE STAKE IN ALIBABA GROUP HOLDING LTD BY 21.3 PERCENT TO 4.3 MILLION SPONSORED ADS
* APPALOOSA LP UPS SHARE STAKE IN MICRON TECHNOLOGY INC BY 61.3 PERCENT TO 27.5 MILLION SHARES
* APPALOOSA LP TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 1.1 MILLION SHARES IN PG&E CORP
* APPALOOSA LP UPS SHARE STAKE IN XPO LOGISTICS INC TO 2.2 MILLION SHARES FROM 64,311 SHARES
* APPALOOSA LP CUTS SHARE STAKE IN SOUTHWEST AIRLINES CO BY ABOUT 90.4 PERCENT TO 74,265 SHARES
* APPALOOSA LP - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2CmrRSi ) Source text for quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 ( bit.ly/2zJRjl2 )
